summary: Young black man teams up with a Chinese kung-fu expert to fight a drug ring.
cast: Timothy Brown|Alan Tang|Aldo Ray|James Hong|Don Oliver|Al Richardson|Carol Speed|Clare Torao|Lung Chan|Richard Lee-Sung|Ching-Ying Lam|Margo Hope|Steve Armstrong|Jean Clark|Erik Cord|Susie Ewing|Steve Fisher|Yung-Sheng Kuo|Wing Sing Kwok|King Chu Lee|Philip Li|Stephen Low|Kenny Mack|Esther Marrow|Ken Obuku|Biff Yeager|Billy Chan|Phillip Ko|Phillip Chung-Fung Kwok|Tony Liu|Mars
title: Dynamite Brothers
